item.title: Review: Outlaw Star: Vol. 1: Disc 1
item.description:
Quick review. I liked Cowboy Bebop, and I believe this was recommended from Amazon (for those who like Cowboy Bebop). Instead of purchasing the complete collection of Outlaw Star, I decided to try out one of the discs, containing the first five episodes, from Netflix.

Since I enjoyed Cowboy Bebop, I must say I enjoyed Outlaw Star in the same way. Both series appear to have a similar style, pace, and 'story' (the stories aren't the same, but they contain some similar elements).

Overall, I think I'd purchase the series to view the additional episodes of this series.

Rated NR
2 hr. 5 min. (5 episodes)
2000

Want to see what else I've watched through Netflix? Check out the list, and my attempt to track Netflix shipping for Madison WI.
